name: grip-claw
effect: Held: Increases the duration of the holder’s multiturn (2-5 turn) moves by three turns.
short_effect: Held: Holder’s multi-turn trapping moves last 5 turns.

flavor_text.black_white: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.
